RT ropats16 (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ Imagine hackathons where you can use the full duration working on your ideas unique features instead of spending half the time setting up a foundation 💻 StarterKit can help you do that on @ArweaveEco and here’s a video guide to show you how 👇
